summary: Provides a suite of unit tests that verify the BarkFineModel's configuration, inference behavior (including flash‑attention variants), forward method signature, half‑precision generation, handling of input embeddings, common model attributes, resizing of token and untied embeddings, and strict save/load functionality.
business_intent: Validate the correctness and robustness of the BarkFineModel to ensure reliable performance in production and prevent regressions during development.
